builds.name: Thunder Conduit
builds.concept: Lightning-focused build using Essence of Thunder to stack lightning strikes through memory casts and dodges, with AoE splash amplifying every bolt
builds.playstyle: Caster that builds Thunder stacks for massive lightning barrages with heavy area splash

memories.name: Lightning Strike
memories.rationale: Thunder consumes stacks for multiple lightning strikes, Shock empowers attacks with lightning, Pain adds 40% AoE splash to ALL lightning damage for devastating area coverage

memories.name: Chain Lightning
memories.rationale: Flow reduces cooldown when dealing light damage, Insight adds light damage and haste (18pt synergy with Flow), Momentum reduces cooldowns per attack

memories.name: Static Discharge
memories.rationale: Efficiency reduces cooldowns, Voracity provides healing, Stillness empowers casts every 5 seconds with 200% Light damage and 2-second stun

memories.name: Frostbite
memories.rationale: Glacial Core converts healing to cold damage shards, Guidance converts excess healing to barriers, Frost scales cold damage with max health and permanently increases HP

builds.strategy: Use Lightning Strike with Thunder to consume stacks for multiple lightning strikes. Pain causes every lightning bolt to deal 40% splash AoE, massively amplifying area damage. Cast other memories and use Flicker to build Thunder stacks up to 7. Chain Lightning with Flow and Insight creates a cooldown reduction loop from light damage. Static Discharge with Stillness provides empowered casts every 5 seconds for stun control. Frostbite with Glacial Core and Frost converts healing to cold damage scaled by max health.
strengths: Massive lightning AoE through Pain splash on every Thunder bolt
Self-sustaining cooldown reduction cycle via Flow+Insight
Strong crowd control from Stillness stun every 5 seconds
Healing-to-damage conversion through Glacial Core + Frost scaling
weaknesses: Requires frequent memory casts to build stacks
Positioning dependent for optimal lightning hits
Energy management critical
Lower damage without Thunder stacks

builds.name: Perfect Arcane Master
builds.concept: Universal stat-focused build using Perfection combined with cooldown reduction for maximum ability uptime and cold conversion scaling
builds.playstyle: Versatile caster with permanent stat boosts, high ability frequency, and health-scaling cold damage

memories.name: Frostbite
memories.rationale: Perfection provides universal stat boosts, Momentum and Efficiency stack cooldown reduction (15pt synergy) for maximum Frostbite uptime

memories.name: Lightning Strike
memories.rationale: Divine Faith scales with kills (18pt synergy with Perfection), Insight adds light damage and haste, Clemency provides 4% leech healing

memories.name: Static Discharge
memories.rationale: Flow reduces cooldown with light damage (18pt synergy with Insight), Voracity provides healing per attack, Pain adds 40% AoE splash to Static Discharge's charged light damage

memories.name: Beam of Light
memories.rationale: Glacial Core converts Beam of Light's healing output to cold damage shards, Guidance converts excess healing to barriers, Frost scales cold damage with max health

builds.strategy: Perfection on Frostbite provides permanent stat boosts across all categories. Lightning Strike with Divine Faith scales damage and health with kills. Static Discharge with Flow and Pain creates AoE-amplified light damage that feeds Flow's cooldown reduction on all memories. Beam of Light channels healing to allies while Glacial Core converts that healing to cold damage shards and Frost scales it with max health. The combination of Perfection's universal stats, Divine Faith's scaling, and the Flow+Insight CDR loop creates exponential power growth.
strengths: Permanent universal stat boosts from Perfection
Infinite scaling with Divine Faith
40% AoE splash on Static Discharge's massive charged damage
Healing-to-cold-damage conversion with health scaling
weaknesses: Requires Perfection essence (legendary)
Complex resource management
Positioning dependent
Weaker early game before scaling

builds.name: Finality Arcane
builds.concept: Build using Essence of Finality paired with Inversion on the same memory for massive empowered casts: longer cooldown means more Finality stacks plus 20% more damage
builds.playstyle: Strategic caster that maximizes Finality stacks and Inversion's damage amp for devastating empowered abilities

memories.name: Frostbite
memories.rationale: Finality stacks damage while off cooldown (5% per stack up to 20), Inversion increases cooldown by 15% BUT adds 20% damage - the longer cooldown means MORE Finality stacks (~13pt combined synergy), Flexibility splits damage while on cooldown for survivability

memories.name: Lightning Strike
memories.rationale: Metal resets cooldown on kills for rapid recasting, Opportunity reduces dodge cooldown by 3 seconds feeding Thunder stacks, Thunder builds stacks from casts/dodges for massive lightning

memories.name: Chain Lightning
memories.rationale: Flow reduces cooldown with light damage (18pt synergy with Insight), Insight adds light damage and 20 memory haste, Clemency provides 4% leech healing

memories.name: Tranquility
memories.rationale: Efficiency reduces cooldowns, Voracity provides healing per attack, Glacial Core converts healing to cold damage shards

builds.strategy: Frostbite with Finality+Inversion is the core combo: Inversion's 15% longer cooldown gives Finality more time to stack (approaching 20 stacks for 100% damage increase), plus Inversion itself adds 20% base damage. The empowered Frostbite deals devastating damage. Lightning Strike with Metal resets on kills for rapid recasting, and Opportunity feeds dodge cooldown reduction to build more Thunder stacks. Chain Lightning with Flow+Insight creates the CDR loop. Tranquility reduces all cooldowns by 3.5 seconds. Focus on letting Finality stack, then unleash massive empowered Frostbites while using other abilities to keep Thunder stacks high.
strengths: Finality+Inversion on same memory creates 120%+ damage empowered casts
Metal provides instant cooldown resets on kills
Opportunity feeds Thunder stacks through frequent dodges
Flow+Insight CDR loop keeps all abilities cycling
weaknesses: Requires careful cooldown management for Finality timing
Lower damage without Finality stacks
Complex timing requirements between Finality windows
Vulnerable during cooldown periods if Flexibility is not active

builds.name: Automated Thunder Basic Attacker
builds.concept: Basic attack focused build using Essence of Thunder that builds stacks through basic attacks and Flicker, with Momentum to reduce cooldowns
builds.playstyle: Basic attack spammer that builds Thunder stacks and unleashes massive lightning barrages automatically

memories.name: Lightning Strike
memories.rationale: Thunder builds stacks from casts/dodges and consumes for lightning, Momentum reduces cooldown with each basic attack, Fangs provides guaranteed crits that reduce cooldown

memories.name: Chain Lightning
memories.rationale: Flow reduces cooldown when dealing light damage, Stillness stuns enemies for 2 seconds on empowered casts (every 5 seconds), Voracity restores 6 health per attack for 5 seconds after casting

passive_essences.name: Essence of Shock
passive_essences.rationale: Passive essence - empowers every 4th basic attack with lightning (doesn't need to be on a memory)

passive_essences.name: Essence of Domination
passive_essences.rationale: Passive essence - increases crit chance by 20% and scales crit damage with crits (doesn't need to be on a memory)

passive_essences.name: Essence of Snow
passive_essences.rationale: Passive essence - provides barrier of 40 that recharges and fires snowballs for crowd control (doesn't need to be on a memory)

passive_essences.name: Perfection
passive_essences.rationale: Passive essence - provides universal stat boosts (doesn't need to be on a memory)

builds.strategy: Lightning Strike with Thunder builds stacks every time you cast a memory or use Flicker. Momentum reduces its cooldown with every basic attack, while Fangs ensures every 4th attack is a crit that further reduces cooldown. Chain Lightning with Stillness stuns enemies every 5 seconds on empowered casts, and Voracity provides 6 health per attack for 5 seconds after casting. Equip passive essences (Shock, Domination, Snow, Perfection) separately for additional damage and survivability. Simply spam basic attacks - each attack reduces cooldowns and heals you, and when Lightning Strike is ready, it unleashes massive lightning barrages. Use Flicker frequently to build Thunder stacks. The build requires minimal active memory usage, focusing on basic attacks while abilities trigger automatically.
strengths: Basic attacks continuously reduce cooldowns
Massive lightning damage with full Thunder stacks
Minimal active memory management required
High uptime through attack-based cooldown reduction
weaknesses: Requires frequent Flicker usage to build stacks
Lower damage without Thunder stacks
Positioning important for optimal lightning hits
Requires Thunder essence (epic)

builds.name: Maximum Damage Thunder God
builds.concept: Optimized damage build using Divine Faith for infinite scaling, combined with Domination for crit scaling, Predation for boss damage, and multiple healing sources for survivability
builds.playstyle: High-damage caster that scales infinitely with kills while maintaining strong survivability through healing and barriers

memories.name: Lightning Strike
memories.rationale: Divine Faith scales damage and health infinitely with kills (up to 75 stacks, 22pt synergy with Domination), Domination scales crit damage with each crit, Predation increases damage to bosses by 60% and drops Orbs of Power for permanent stat increases

memories.name: Frostbite
memories.rationale: Perfection provides universal stat boosts (18pt synergy with Divine Faith), Clemency provides 4% leech from all damage (25pt synergy with Glacial Core), Glacial Core converts healing to cold damage

memories.name: Chain Lightning
memories.rationale: Thunder builds stacks for massive lightning barrages, Voracity restores 6 health per attack for 5 seconds after casting, Momentum reduces cooldown with each basic attack

memories.name: Beam of Light
memories.rationale: Flow reduces cooldown when dealing light damage (18pt synergy with Insight), Insight adds 200% Light damage and 20 Memory Haste, Accuracy fires additional projectiles on distant targets for more light damage procs

passive_essences.name: Essence of Composure
passive_essences.rationale: Passive essence - increases crit chance by 30% for 5 seconds after casting (doesn't need to be on a memory, complements Domination's crit scaling on Lightning Strike)

destruction: Aggressive Stance (max level)
Lucky Clover (max level)
Night Time (max level)
Hurricane (max level)
Yubar-specific Destruction powers (prioritize damage scaling)
life: Yubar-specific Life powers (prioritize health and healing)
imagination: Bizarre Spoils (max level) - 100% chance for random Essence from Mini Bosses
Primordial Chaos (max level) - 20% chance for additional Chaos rewards
Additional common Imagination powers for utility
flexible: Yubar-specific Flexible powers that modify memories
Any high-value powers from other categories

builds.strategy: Lightning Strike with Divine Faith scales damage and health infinitely with each kill (up to 75 stacks = 37.5% damage/healing increase + 300 max health). Domination on Lightning Strike scales crit damage infinitely with each crit. Predation increases boss damage by 60% and provides permanent stat increases. Frostbite with Perfection provides permanent universal stat boosts while Clemency+Glacial Core creates the healing-to-damage conversion loop (25pt synergy). Chain Lightning with Thunder builds stacks for massive barrages while Voracity provides healing. Beam of Light with Flow+Insight creates the CDR loop (18pt synergy) and Accuracy fires extra projectiles at range for more Light damage procs feeding Flow. Composure as a passive provides 30% crit chance for 5 seconds after casting, feeding Domination's crit scaling. Focus on eliminating enemies quickly to stack Divine Faith while maintaining survivability through multiple healing sources.
strengths: Infinite damage scaling with Divine Faith (up to 75 stacks)
Infinite crit damage scaling with Domination
Composure passive provides 30% crit chance burst for Domination scaling
Clemency+Glacial Core healing-to-damage loop (25pt synergy)
Flow+Insight CDR loop with Accuracy amplifying ranged procs
60% increased boss damage through Predation
Permanent stat increases from Orbs of Power
Universal stat boosts from Perfection
weaknesses: Requires kills to scale effectively
Weaker early game before Faith stacks
Requires multiple legendary essences
Positioning important for optimal lightning hits

builds.name: Ultimate Basic Attack Thunder God
builds.concept: Pure basic attack build maximizing attack speed, crit chance, and lightning-triggered effects for maximum DPS with AoE splash amplification
builds.playstyle: Spam basic attacks continuously, triggering empowered lightning attacks, healing, and cooldown reduction with every hit

memories.name: Lightning Strike
memories.rationale: Momentum reduces cooldown by 0.4 seconds with each basic attack, Fangs makes every 4th attack a crit (18pt synergy with Domination) reducing cooldown by 0.7s and launching 2 Fangs dealing 60% damage each, Shock empowers every 4th attack with lightning (40% light damage, bounces up to 2 times, scales with crit chance)

memories.name: Frostbite
memories.rationale: Voracity restores 6 health per attack for 5 seconds after casting, Wind increases attack speed by 33% for 5 seconds, Flow reduces cooldown when dealing light damage

memories.name: Chain Lightning
memories.rationale: Clemency provides 4% leech from all damage, Insight adds 200% light damage and 20 Memory Haste (18pt synergy with Flow), Pain adds 40% AoE splash to all Chain Lightning damage for massive area coverage

memories.name: Beam of Light
memories.rationale: Domination increases crit chance by 20% and scales crit damage infinitely, Stillness provides empowered casts with light damage and stun every 5 seconds, Efficiency reduces cooldown by 26% for higher uptime

passive_essences.name: Essence of Umbra
passive_essences.rationale: Passive essence - scales damage by 42% of Crit Chance and heals from dark damage (doesn't need to be on a memory, complements Domination's crit scaling on Beam of Light)

passive_essences.name: Perfection
passive_essences.rationale: Passive essence - provides universal stat boosts (+7 Attack Damage, +7 Ability Power, +35 Max Health, +10% Attack Speed, +6% Crit Chance, +10 Memory Haste)

passive_essences.name: Essence of Snow
passive_essences.rationale: Passive essence - provides barrier of 40 that recharges and fires snowballs for crowd control

destruction: Starry Sky Tapestry (max level) - +11 Ability Power (Yubar-specific)
Dazzling Meteor (max level) - +6 Ability Power at levels 5/10/15/20 (Yubar-specific)
Stellar Flow (max level) - +15 Memory Haste (Yubar-specific)
Eclipse (max level) - Ability Power = 45% of Attack Damage (Yubar-specific)
Night Time (max level) - +8 Ability Power (common)
Lucky Clover (max level) - +13% Critical Strike Chance (common)
Hurricane (max level) - +10.5% Attack Speed (common)
life: Now You See Me (max level) - +33% Dodge travel distance (Yubar-specific)
Peek-a-boo! (max level) - Dodge cooldown -0.8s, travel distance -20% (Yubar-specific)
Stellar Trace (max level) - +1 Dodge charge, cooldown +1s (Yubar-specific)
Wicked Vitality (max level) - Basic Attacks restore 0.70% Max Health (150% on crit) (common)
Combat First Aid (max level) - Restore 2.50% Max Health on kill (common)
imagination: Bizarre Spoils (max level) - 100% chance for random Essence from Mini Bosses (common)
Primordial Chaos (max level) - 20% chance for additional Chaos rewards (common)
Dream-born (max level) - +150% Dream Dust from Shrine of Dismantling (Yubar-specific)
Cookie Baker (max level) - 1.2% chance for Star Cookie on enemy kill (Yubar-specific)
God in a Fairy Tale (max level) - -10% Max Health, +20% Dream Dust from all sources (Yubar-specific)
Wealth Accumulation (max level) - +10% Gold from defeating enemies (common)
flexible: Flow Reversal (max level) - Chain Lightning bounces back to Yubar, dealing 200% damage and healing 20% (Yubar-specific, requires Chain Lightning memory)

builds.strategy: Spam basic attacks continuously. Every attack reduces Lightning Strike's cooldown by 0.4 seconds through Momentum. Every 4th attack is a guaranteed crit (Fangs) that further reduces cooldown by 0.7 seconds and launches 2 Fangs. Every 4th attack also triggers Shock lightning (40% light damage, bounces up to 2 times). Chain Lightning with Pain causes every bounce to deal 40% AoE splash, dramatically increasing area coverage. Flow reduces cooldowns when dealing light damage, and Insight amplifies that with 200% Light damage procs (18pt synergy). Clemency provides 4% leech from all damage. Domination scales crit damage infinitely. Umbra as a passive adds 42% of Crit Chance as bonus damage and heals from dark damage. Simply hold down basic attack - every hit heals you, reduces cooldowns, and triggers lightning effects. Pain on Chain Lightning ensures massive area damage when it bounces between enemies.
strengths: Extremely high attack speed potential (Wind + Hurricane)
40% AoE splash on Chain Lightning via Pain for massive area damage
Flow+Insight CDR loop (18pt synergy) for rapid ability cycling
Umbra passive scales damage with crit chance and adds dark healing
Multiple healing sources (Voracity, Clemency leech, Umbra)
Continuous cooldown reduction through basic attacks
Infinite crit damage scaling with Domination
Minimal active memory management required
weaknesses: Requires high attack speed for optimal performance
Positioning important for optimal lightning bounces
Lower single-target burst than ability-focused builds
Requires multiple epic/legendary essences

builds.name: Elemental Harmony Master
builds.concept: Multi-element build applying all 4 elemental stacks to trigger Elementalist constellation power for 24% damage boost to fully debuffed enemies
builds.playstyle: Apply Fire, Cold, Light, and Dark stacks to enemies, then deal massively amplified damage to fully debuffed targets

memories.name: Lightning Strike
memories.rationale: Insight provides Light damage and haste (18pt synergy with Flow), Shock empowers attacks with Light lightning, Flow reduces cooldowns on Light damage - establishes Light element

memories.name: Frostbite
memories.rationale: Freezing applies Cold stacks, Frost amplifies Cold damage with max health scaling, Glacial Core converts healing to Cold - establishes Cold element

memories.name: Chain Lightning
memories.rationale: Twilight converts to Dark and consumes stacks, Dusk fires Dark shards, Umbra scales damage with crit - establishes Dark element

memories.name: Static Discharge
memories.rationale: Eternal Flame applies Burn curse (20pt synergy with Eye of the Sun), Eye of the Sun damages burning enemies with Solar Light, Scorch fires fireballs - establishes Fire element

passive_essences.name: Perfection
passive_essences.rationale: Universal stats to amplify all elemental damage

destruction: Starry Sky Tapestry (max level) - +11 Ability Power (Yubar-specific)
Stellar Flow (max level) - +15 Memory Haste for element rotation (Yubar-specific)
Elementalist (max level) - +24% damage to enemies with ALL 4 elements (CRITICAL)
Daylight (max level) - +3% Light damage per stack
Corrupted Mind (max level) - +3% Dark damage per stack
Crimson Flame (max level) - +45% Burn damage
life: Combat First Aid (max level) - +2.50% Max Health on kill
imagination: Bizarre Spoils (max level) - 100% chance for random Essence from Mini Bosses
Primordial Chaos (max level) - 20% chance for additional Chaos rewards

builds.strategy: The goal is to apply all 4 elements to enemies to activate Elementalist's 24% damage bonus. Rotation: Lightning Strike for Light stacks -> Frostbite for Cold stacks -> Chain Lightning for Dark stacks -> Static Discharge for Fire/Burn stacks. Once all 4 elements are applied, ALL damage is increased by 24%. Eternal Flame + Eye of the Sun on Static Discharge creates infinite burn scaling (20pt synergy). Flow+Insight on Lightning Strike creates the CDR loop (18pt synergy). Each element also has its own damage amplifier. Against bosses, cycle through abilities to maintain all 4 elements constantly.
strengths: 24% damage bonus with all elements applied (Elementalist)
Eternal Flame + Eye of the Sun burn synergy (20pt) on fire memory
Flow+Insight CDR loop (18pt) on light memory
Excellent area control with multiple damage types
Strong sustained damage against bosses
weaknesses: Requires maintaining 4 different elemental debuffs
Complex rotation management
Damage reduced if elements fall off
Less burst damage than focused builds

builds.name: Glass Cannon Supreme
builds.concept: Maximum damage mage sacrificing health for devastating Ability Power using Glass Cannon constellation, Overload, and damage amplification with Wound explosions
builds.playstyle: Accept fragility for overwhelming magical destruction - the ultimate high-risk, high-reward caster with massive AoE explosions

memories.name: Lightning Strike
memories.rationale: Thunder for massive lightning burst, Overload sacrifices 20% health for 45% empowered damage, Insight adds 200% Light damage and 20 Memory Haste

memories.name: Chain Lightning
memories.rationale: Flow reduces cooldowns on Light damage (18pt synergy with Insight), Stillness empowers casts with 200% light damage and stun every 5 seconds, Shock adds lightning to every 4th attack

memories.name: Static Discharge
memories.rationale: Efficiency and Momentum minimize cooldowns (15pt synergy), Pain adds 40% AoE splash to Static Discharge's massive charged Light damage

memories.name: Frostbite
memories.rationale: Domination scales crit damage infinitely (18pt synergy with Fangs), Fangs provides guaranteed crits every 4th attack, Wound marks enemies and explodes for 275% AoE damage after 3 attacks

destruction: Glass Cannon (max level) - +9 Attack Damage, +13 Ability Power, -15% Max Health (Yubar-specific, CRITICAL)
Starry Sky Tapestry (max level) - +11 Ability Power (Yubar-specific)
Dazzling Meteor (max level) - +6 AP per level milestone (Yubar-specific)
Stellar Flow (max level) - +15 Memory Haste (Yubar-specific)
Night Time (max level) - +8 Ability Power
Powerful Blow (max level) - +24% Critical Strike Damage
life: Combat First Aid (max level) - +2.50% Max Health on kill (critical for sustain)
imagination: Bizarre Spoils (max level) - 100% chance for random Essence from Mini Bosses
Primordial Chaos (max level) - 20% chance for additional Chaos rewards
Quick Thinking (max level) - Memory Haste increase

builds.strategy: Embrace the glass cannon philosophy. Glass Cannon constellation sacrifices 15% Max Health for massive AP. Overload further sacrifices health for 45% empowered casts. Open fights with Stillness-empowered Lightning Strike with Thunder stacks for devastating burst. Wound on Frostbite marks enemies and after 3 attacks explodes for 275% AoE damage - far better sustained damage than Lethality's opener-only bonus. Pain on Static Discharge splashes 40% of its massive charged damage to all nearby enemies. Chain abilities rapidly using Flow+Insight (18pt synergy) and Momentum+Efficiency (15pt synergy) CDR. Domination+Fangs (18pt synergy) scale crit damage infinitely.
strengths: Extremely high Ability Power from Glass Cannon + Overload
275% AoE explosions every 3 attacks from Wound
40% AoE splash on Static Discharge from Pain
Triple CDR synergy pairs: Flow+Insight, Momentum+Efficiency, Domination+Fangs
Fast ability cycling for rapid burst rotation
weaknesses: Very low health pool (-15% from Glass Cannon + Overload cost)
Extremely fragile - dies to burst damage
Requires excellent positioning
Minimal sustain options

builds.name: Chaos Wildcard Mage
builds.concept: Build centered on Apple of Discord's random memory transformation (4 free casts per room with no cooldown) combined with Pain splash, Wound explosions, and the Flow+Insight CDR engine
builds.playstyle: Adaptive caster who gets 4 free random ability casts per room while maintaining a core lightning+CDR engine for consistent damage

memories.name: Lightning Strike
memories.rationale: Apple of Discord transforms this memory into a random memory with NO cooldown (4 free casts per room), Pain adds 40% AoE splash to whatever random ability you get, Wound marks enemies for 275% AoE explosions after 3 attacks

memories.name: Chain Lightning
memories.rationale: Flow reduces cooldown when dealing Light damage (18pt synergy with Insight), Insight adds 200% Light damage and 20 Memory Haste, Thunder builds stacks from casts (including Apple of Discord casts!) for massive lightning

memories.name: Static Discharge
memories.rationale: Efficiency reduces cooldowns (15pt synergy with Momentum), Momentum reduces CD per attack, Stillness empowers casts every 5 seconds with 200% Light damage and stun

memories.name: Frostbite
memories.rationale: Voracity restores 6 health per attack for 5 seconds, Clemency provides 4% leech (25pt synergy with Glacial Core), Glacial Core converts healing to cold damage shards

builds.strategy: Apple of Discord is the centerpiece: every room it transforms into a random memory with NO cooldown and 4 free casts. Each cast builds Thunder stacks on Chain Lightning AND benefits from Pain's 40% AoE splash and Wound's marking for 275% explosions. This creates an explosive opening to every room. After the 4 free casts, the core engine takes over: Chain Lightning with Flow+Insight (18pt synergy) creates the CDR loop, Static Discharge with Efficiency+Momentum (15pt synergy) and Stillness provides consistent damage and crowd control, and Frostbite with Clemency+Glacial Core (25pt synergy) sustains through healing-to-damage conversion. Thunder stacks from Apple casts make the first Chain Lightning devastating.
strengths: 4 free no-cooldown casts per room from Apple of Discord
40% AoE splash on random abilities via Pain
275% AoE explosions every 3 attacks from Wound
Apple casts build Thunder stacks for free
Clemency+Glacial Core healing loop (25pt synergy)
Flow+Insight CDR engine (18pt synergy)
High adaptability - different random memory each room
weaknesses: Random memory each room means inconsistent opening damage type
Apple of Discord limited to 4 casts then reverts
Requires Apple of Discord (legendary, 0 builds currently use it)
No control over which memory Apple transforms into

focus: Light damage amplification for CDR engine
Ability Power for Apple of Discord cast damage

builds.name: Inferno Thunder Hybrid
builds.concept: Fire+Lightning hybrid exploiting the Eternal Flame+Fever chain explosion loop (22pts) alongside Thunder stacks, with Embertail ricochet spreading burns to feed Eye of the Sun
builds.playstyle: Dual-element devastator that spreads infinite burn stacks while building Thunder for massive lightning+fire hybrid bursts

memories.name: Static Discharge
memories.rationale: Eternal Flame applies burn curse and scales 2% per burn stack, Fever creates chain explosions that scale with fire stacks (22pt synergy with Eternal Flame), Sulfur converts to fire and adds 50% fire DoT (20pt combined with Eternal Flame's scaling)

memories.name: Lightning Strike
memories.rationale: Thunder builds stacks for lightning barrages, Embertail ricochets 100% Fire damage to nearby enemies spreading burns (20pt synergy with Eye of the Sun AND Eternal Flame), Eye of the Sun rains Solar Light on burning enemies every 20 seconds (20pt synergy with Embertail)

memories.name: Chain Lightning
memories.rationale: Flow reduces cooldowns on Light damage (18pt synergy with Insight), Insight adds 200% Light damage and Memory Haste, Pain adds 40% AoE splash amplifying all Chain Lightning bounces

memories.name: Frostbite
memories.rationale: Clemency provides 4% leech from all fire and lightning damage, Voracity restores health per attack, Efficiency reduces cooldown for higher Frostbite uptime

builds.strategy: Static Discharge with Eternal Flame+Fever+Sulfur is the fire engine: every hit applies burn curse, Fever creates chain explosions scaling with fire stacks (22pt synergy), and Sulfur adds 50% fire DoT plus fire conversion. Lightning Strike with Embertail ricochets 100% Fire damage to nearby enemies, spreading burns everywhere for Eye of the Sun's Solar Light (20pt synergy) - every 20 seconds, Solar Light rains on ALL burning enemies for 360% Fire damage and 9 more burn stacks. Thunder stacks build from all the casting for devastating lightning bursts. Chain Lightning with Flow+Insight (18pt synergy) keeps everything cycling fast with Pain splashing AoE. The build creates a self-reinforcing fire+lightning loop where more burns = more damage = more stacks = more explosions.
strengths: Eternal Flame+Fever chain explosion loop (22pt synergy)
Embertail+Eye of the Sun mass burn detonation (20pt synergy)
Embertail+Eternal Flame ricochet burn spread (20pt synergy)
Flow+Insight CDR engine (18pt synergy)
40% AoE splash via Pain on Chain Lightning
Infinite damage scaling through burn stacks
Two element hybrid avoids single-element resistance issues
weaknesses: Requires finding 3 legendary/unique essences (Eternal Flame, Embertail, Eye of the Sun)
Fire-resistant enemies reduce half the build's damage
Complex multi-element rotation management
Weaker against single targets with no spread potential

focus: Fire damage amplification and Burn damage bonuses
Light damage amplification for CDR loop

builds.name: Wound Detonation Specialist
builds.concept: Build centered on Essence of the Wound's 275% AoE explosion combined with Essence of Pain's 40% splash and rapid attack cycling for constant detonations across the battlefield
builds.playstyle: Mark enemies with Wound then detonate them in rapid succession with fast-cycling abilities, creating chain AoE explosions across crowds

memories.name: Chain Lightning
memories.rationale: Wound marks enemies on hit, exploding for 275% AoE after 3 attacks - Chain Lightning's bouncing nature marks multiple enemies at once, Pain adds 40% AoE splash to both the bounces and the Wound explosions, Flow reduces cooldown on Light damage

memories.name: Lightning Strike
memories.rationale: Thunder builds stacks for multiple lightning strikes (each strike counts as an attack against Wound marks), Insight adds 200% Light damage and Memory Haste (18pt synergy with Flow), Shock empowers every 4th basic attack with lightning for more Wound mark hits

memories.name: Static Discharge
memories.rationale: Momentum reduces CD per basic attack (15pt synergy with Efficiency), Efficiency provides 26% CDR, Accuracy fires additional projectiles at distant enemies for more Wound mark detonations

memories.name: Frostbite
memories.rationale: Voracity restores 6 health per attack for 5 seconds, Clemency provides 4% leech from all explosion damage, Wind increases attack speed by 33% for faster Wound detonations

builds.strategy: Chain Lightning is the primary Wound applicator - each bounce applies a Mark, and after 3 attacks on any marked enemy, it explodes for 275% AoE damage. Pain makes every Chain Lightning bounce AND every Wound explosion deal 40% additional AoE splash, creating chain reactions across crowds. Thunder stacks from frequent casting, and each lightning bolt from Thunder consumption counts as a hit against Wound marks for rapid detonation. Insight+Flow (18pt synergy) keeps Chain Lightning cycling rapidly. Accuracy on Static Discharge fires extra projectiles at range to detonate distant Wound marks. Wind's 33% attack speed boost from Frostbite accelerates basic attack-driven Wound detonations between casts. The build excels at clearing dense mob packs through cascading explosions.
strengths: 275% AoE explosions from Wound on multiple enemies simultaneously
40% AoE splash from Pain amplifies both abilities and explosions
Chain Lightning bounces apply Wound marks to 5+ enemies per cast
Thunder bolts rapidly detonate Wound marks
Flow+Insight CDR loop (18pt synergy) for rapid Chain Lightning cycling
Momentum+Efficiency CDR stacking (15pt synergy)
Exceptional mob clearing through chain detonations
weaknesses: Wound requires 3 attacks per mark to detonate - slower against single targets
Relies on enemy density for maximum chain explosion value
No infinite scaling mechanic (no Divine Faith/Domination)
Limited survivability compared to healing-focused builds

focus: Light damage amplification for Chain Lightning
Cooldown reduction for rapid ability cycling
Area damage bonuses to amplify explosions
Attack speed for faster Wound detonations
